## Required documents:
- Receipts for transportation/lodging. 
- A filled [Travel reimbursement PDF form](files/Travelreimbursementform.pdf)

**Please Submit them though (Link)**

## General Process

::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="45%"}
### Step 1: Vendor registration email

Each attendee will receive an email invitation to register as a vendor in PaymentWorks.
:::
:::

::: {.column width="55%"}
![](files/invitation_email.png){width=100% fig-alt="Vendor registration invitation email"}
:::

:::

::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="45%"}
### Step 2: Register your account

After completing the registration form, you will receive an activation email and log in again to continue.
:::
:::

::: {.column width="55%"}
![](files/register1.png){width=100% fig-alt="Vendor registration screen"}
:::

:::

::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="45%"}
### Step 3: Multi-Factor Authentication

You will be asked to complete multi-factor authentication using your phone number.
:::
:::

::: {.column width="55%"}
![](files/multifactor.png){width=100% fig-alt="Multi-factor authentication screen"}
:::

:::

### Final step: Complete information based on your tax residency

After registration, internal review, and approval, you will be set up as a vendor and ready for payment or reimbursement.
